name: .CLIPCHAMP File Extension
summary: Learn about .CLIPCHAMP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open CLIPCHAMP files with the Windows desktop and web versions of Microsoft Clipchamp. While Clipchamp is available for iOS devices, this version does not support CLIPCHAMP files.
Microsoft Clipchamp can convert CLIPCHAMP files to .MP4 video and .GIF image files. To do so, select the Export button in the upper-right corner of the program.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
